pre_caption: This is a static scenery shot of a vast desert landscape under a bright, hazy sun. Large, rolling sand dunes dominate the view, with a few small palm trees scattered in the distance. The only discernible movement is fine sand being blown across the surface of the dunes by the wind.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
original_caption: This is a static scenery shot of a vast desert landscape under a bright, hazy sun. Large, rolling sand dunes dominate the view, with a few small palm trees scattered in the distance. The only discernible movement is fine sand being blown across the surface of the dunes by the wind.
